"In the casual NTR, we don't know much about the protagonist, but what appeals to the audience is the fact that sexual desires for the victim, normally the female, overwhelms love, and for this reason, as I have stated before, portrays her as" 
I expressed this sentence wrongly. We don't know much about the partner; the appeal of NTR is sexual behaviour disregarding and forgetting about morals.

an animal. This appeal is what represents the fetish that NTR holds in hentai. In real life, NTR fetish is a different matter which I do not know why such it exists. In fiction, it's just animalistic sexual instincts, and with more exposure to such genre you will just come to accept it. Seriously, if you have nothing good to say, and if you know it will upset a lot of people, then don't say it at all. It's a fight of preferences. I don't like NTR like [312961], but others like [158862] where you don't see much of the partner, and where the art style creates a tempting illusion, allowing us to forget what morals are in the fantasy, then I can accept it.

I went to check on this comment history, and this is getting out of hand. 
Firstly, I agree, getting cucked is fucked up. If you enjoy Netori, then that means from the victim's perspective, that's NTR, and if the victim is a corrupt piece of shit, and if he or she is the protagonist, then the genre NTR can be expressed as a sexual fantasy to many readers. In hentai, anything can be expressed, and there are no limits as how fucked up things are. 
For instance, the infamous [312961] is a NTR that nobody fucking likes, and the reason being is because we are somewhat attached to the protagonist, and the morals and loyalty is deeply emphasised in here, but was heartlessly betrayed. Another one is [12491]. 
NTR, as we all know it, measures differently. In the casual NTR, we don't know much about the protagonist, but what appeals to the audience is the fact that sexual desires for the victim, normally the female, overwhelms love, and for this reason, as I have stated before, portrays her as
